website_summaries.verdict: A quality, rustic-looking ashtray. The slightly convex bottom will help to keep ashes in the tray when placed outside.
pros: A heavy layer of lacquer protects the quality wood and grain from burning, and makes it easy to clean
Sturdy enough to survive a fall

customer_reviews.title: Cheap wood, cracked down the middle without use.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Arrived with chips missing from its bark. Additionally the wood cracked down the middle just sitting there with no ash in it. Presumably from drying out. When we received the package it was very wet with condensation. Stay away from this cheap Chinese crap. Our American wood workers are much more talented.
customer_reviews.author: Gear Head

customer_reviews.title: Great appeal and very natural feel.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for price. Feels so much more natural especially for legal herb patients. It’s real varnished wood!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonnoone Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Real Wood Ashtray
customer_reviews.text: These are great ashtrays- I've ordered 4 total over the past few months and they are natural cut trees that are carved out and lacquered over. Each ashtray is slightly different and a few aren't even round- which to me is a plus for giving each one unique character. I am very happy with purchasing these and I'll definitely continue to be a repeat customer of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Keith K.

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t even using it a week and it cracked. Completely down the side as well as a few inches on the bottom. Never dropped or exposed to direct sunlight, it just sat on my outdoor table
customer_reviews.author: Fronk

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, well finished and conveniently sized. No downsides to report yet, but I do expect the finish on the top and inside to discolor over time as other wooden ashtrays I own have done. Still, it's nicely made, priced right, and a great size. Country of origin is China which is probably why the product description says things like "It is made of natural tree, which makes you enjoy the pleasure of returning to nature." Don't know how effective it will be in making me feel like I'm returning to nature, but as an ashtray, it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Huge Crack
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited when I bought this product. Went with the wooden theme for my backyard. The product was nice on arrival and was extremely shiny. However after 3 weeks of use there is a huge crack and was very disappointed. I was recommending this product to everyone but now I would not.
customer_reviews.author: Charu

customer_reviews.title: Great decor for the back wood lover in your life!!!  :)
customer_reviews.text: The first received was damaged, however, the seller communicated/replaced it promptly. We love it!!! It completes our back woods decor. Thank you VERY much. Well worth the extra brief wait time for replacement. :)
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: Nice look for a low price.
customer_reviews.text: The ashtray adds a nice aesthetic to your room, it appears as if it is made out of real wood or maybe cut from a whole tree. The base is not level so sometimes it wobbles if you put it down on a flat smooth surface. The cut outs for placing your cigg are very shallow and your cigg might shift and roll over watch out for this.
customer_reviews.author: Murat Ersan

customer_reviews.title: Mines good
customer_reviews.text: My ashtray arrived on time and is in perfect shape. Don't drop it or soak it in water and it should last a long while. These are really nice looking for their unceremonious use as butt stubs. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Forest Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: it came on time. I was a little scared from all the comments saying "product came broken or chipped". But mine came on time. No scratches chipps marks or broke. Love this product and truly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Meydani Perucho

customer_reviews.title: Literally perfect
customer_reviews.text: This ashtray is almost too beautiful to use. I will be ordering multiple more because it is so perfect. It has a sealant on it so it doesn't get ruined by water or the ash and it is super sturdy. Perfect size. Perfect coloring. Literally everything is perfect. I normally don't like things like this but I am obsessed with the beauty and craftsmanship of this beautiful ashtray.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Hammill

customer_reviews.title: It cracked without being used!
customer_reviews.text: It came out of the box tacky and smelling of sealant. A week after, the smell disappeared and ashtray cracked. The person who I gave it to still liked it because it was a decorative ashtray. All the same, I was disappointed. I wish I would have read the reviews first.
customer_reviews.author: SweetCucurbita

customer_reviews.title: Slight chemical smell, but looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: There is a slight chemical smell from the urethane coating on the ashtray. The coating is there to protect the wood from the elements. After leaving the ashtrays outside for a day, the chemical smell went away. I would buy it again...
customer_reviews.author: John Stephens

customer_reviews.title: I've had one problem for the long time I've been using it.
customer_reviews.text: It's not like a ceramic ashtray of course. My ashtray is starting to have a small burn hole from where I've been putting them out (I've had it for about 5 1/2 months), but the hole is not big at all. It's super easy to clean, just run a hose into it, and there's no cracks, chips, or breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Izayah Hooven

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed !
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our small family owned brewery. Now folks can come in and enjoy a bourbon aged beer and a good smoke. Fits our motif very well @Crooked Rooster Brewery.
customer_reviews.author: ShepFL

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was slightly smaller than I expected and had a really strong chemical smell I didn’t like, probably from the sealant. That eventually went away but because of it I don’t use this inside as I had planned.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Unique and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Product is very sturdy and easy to clean. Worth the money you spend and it looks really nice. Will last a long time even out in the rain. Husband loved it as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Huge crack/hole in ashtray
customer_reviews.text: Has big crack in it-Im getting tired of receiving damaged products from Amazon. Cannot use-large open v shaped crack in the wood.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M Allen

customer_reviews.title: Mold. Irregular bowl size
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. 4 out of 5 arrived covered in mold/mildew. For the pice I wouldn’t expect to receive something in such poor condition. Cleaned off with vinegar. Also the bowl sizes ( area for ashes) varied from 3 3/4 inches to almost 5 inches. Purchased the largest size available at the time because they’re for a reception.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Bulgerin

customer_reviews.title: Over all good ash tray !
customer_reviews.text: Had for months now. Works great, clean good , nice looking but does leave stains in bottom when putting butts out. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: osha

customer_reviews.title: CRACKED after hardly using
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be nice for a room with that “rustic” look. I bought one in each size. When the first one split after just a few days, I opened the 2nd one. The second one split wide open after about two weeks. I’ve never felt so compelled to leave a bad review on a product as I do with these. Even aftermarket Apple lightning cables last longer than these ashtrays.
customer_reviews.author: Tina D.

customer_reviews.title: Split AND Used!! Stay Away!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed!! I order alot of online purchases and this is definitely the worst i have ever received! Split down the side and what's worse, IT'S USED!! STILL HAS THE ASHES IN IT!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Harris

customer_reviews.title: ASHTRAY
customer_reviews.text: ITEM ARRIVED WITH A LARGE WEDGE CRACK...NOT DUE TO SHIPPING, CONTAINER WAS WELL PACKED.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brockwell

customer_reviews.title: Its g
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I am happy with it overall but when I was purchasing it I was under the impression it's real wood. Well it looks great, like real tree trunk, with greatily glossy layer but Its so light and feels almost hollow that I am now convinced it must be plastic...
customer_reviews.author: natalia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, large, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looking ashtray - wood and bark finish is glazed in a protective coating so ash cleans off super easily. Cannot recommend more
customer_reviews.author: Mortenson Scharf

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic - just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works great as an ashtray, looks exactly as pictured. Have received many compliments on it - it goes really well on our deck. Certainly better than gross cigarettes! Also holds water if that is important to you - we leave it outside all the time so it collects water from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Katherine Dyczko

customer_reviews.title: Nice but doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: Nice but cuts for cigarettes are too large and not deep enough. Cigs will not stay in the groves of a small amount of wind blows
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift person loved it uses it to this day very durable very cool looking love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it's wood
customer_reviews.text: Very quick and heavy handed application of a (still) sticky resin over a very dry and crumbling piece of wood. I would say that this is shoddy craftsmanship, but it's an ashtray not a dining set. All complaints aside it's hard to find something that doesn't work as an ashtray, and this thing is ok as far as catching ash goes.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Cool and good looking ashtray. Worth twice the price!
customer_reviews.text: My sister and nephew were sharing an ash tray. (Don't ask me why?) This wooden Teagas was inexpensive, so for fun I bought it for my sis. Actually, it's really cool and very sturdy! It's worth twice the price. She loves it, and if she can just keep her son away from it I think she will have it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: D.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Does its job and it has some weight to it as well. It also looks quite nice. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It goes perfect with the decor in my house
customer_reviews.author: Brock Leno

customer_reviews.title: True description. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this. True to description. Easy to clean. Indoor and outdoor. Looks unique.
customer_reviews.author: Kira S Robles

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money good quality very sturdy is very happy with my product.
customer_reviews.author: Cherylin Green

customer_reviews.title: Leaky ashtray
customer_reviews.text: The product came with a big crack in it. See photo
customer_reviews.author: unknown

customer_reviews.title: No complaints!!
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, discreet ashtray that is easy to clean...and in fact hardly shows at all that there had been ashes in there even after just disposing of them...impressive!!
customer_reviews.author: Freebird Mtl

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest ash tray. I bought it for my back porch for company. We have a rustic theme and is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CapiJ

customer_reviews.title: IT IS AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: it looks like real wood, i wad very excited to get this ash tray but worried it would not work well. it is amazing, nothing sticks or stays. its awesome
customer_reviews.author: amy harris

customer_reviews.title: It's Is really nice! But there are somethings if your expecting to ...
customer_reviews.text: It's Is really nice! But there are somethings if your expecting to meet your expectations that won't. I was looking for a cigar ash tray to go at a lake house and it's is ment for cigarettes. The grooves to hold the "cigars" are really small. I ordered the big one which I think is supposed to be 7 inches and it wasn't close. It was at most 5. So if your looking for a decoration or something to look rustic in your home or as for me a covered patio it's good but for an actual ashtray good luck
customer_reviews.author: Zackery T.

customer_reviews.title: More than 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this more than 5 stars, I would. The size and shape are great, the finish gives it a sleek appearance, as well. There’s an endless list of ashtrays to go through, do yourself right and take home this treasure of a find.
customer_reviews.author: NicholasKnuckles

customer_reviews.title: pretty ashtray
customer_reviews.text: This smelled STRONGLY of lacquer out of the box. I put it outside and it dissipated, but wow, that was bracing. Otherwise it's exactly as pictured. It's a very attractive and unique-looking ashtray.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 7.5 inch one. The bottom is bowed, so it wobbles. Its not two tone stain, all dark brown. And it doesn't measure over 6 inches in any direction. But, it will hold a cigar.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Cool gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for placing cigarettes down in the little grooves when not smoking. Covered with poly so ashes won't stick.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Earthy ashtray
customer_reviews.text: Great ashtray. I use it outside. It is a great decorative element on my patio. Is there anything tge Chinese cannot create!?
customer_reviews.author: James langdon

customer_reviews.title: Squirrel Proof
customer_reviews.text: I don't smoke but my sister does. I had an ashtray on the patio for her and the squirrels knocked it off and broke it. I was looking for something that the squirrels couldn't damage and this one does the trick. It's not a very big ashtray but it looks great outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: TxGirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just recently realized this has a crack in it. I guess not bad for having it over a year. Nice craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Real Wood
customer_reviews.text: I like it. it's big and works as a good porch ashtray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracked product
customer_reviews.text: This product was cracked as received it appeared the wood was green and when it dried out it cracked
customer_reviews.author: George Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Looks surprisingly real, except for the shine on it. The 6.5 inch looks more real than the 7.5 inch. I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Newman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved it. We have it on out coffee table and it looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Wilmarie

customer_reviews.title: Crack
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and opened it up and there is a big crack in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jannette

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I didn't want a standard ashtray that was obvious. It's great in that it is super incognito!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We actually ordered two of these and loved them so much we ordered 3 more. We got 6 1/2 inch and they were perfect for our outside patio
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Twitty

customer_reviews.title: Great ashtry
customer_reviews.text: I like this ashtray. It fits my decor and is a great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I didnt realize it was made out of actual wood and it was a lot bigger than expected. I still love it nonetheless
customer_reviews.author: Atalia Rickard

customer_reviews.title: Real wood
customer_reviews.text: I dont leave many reviews on here but I have to say that this Ashtray is real wood. That's hard to come by these days. It's not a replica. They hollowed out an actual tree branch cutting and then sealed it this what looks like a spray on Poly. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: micheal j deblasis

customer_reviews.title: Great ashtray
customer_reviews.text: Awesome look and very easy to clean out and the hole is the perfect size for a coaster to sit on top to suppress the smell
customer_reviews.author: kori gailliot

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture, good quality, a little bigger than I expected but looks very nice
customer_reviews.author: Cassadie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: This arrived to my house broken. An entire piece was broken out of it and the broken piece wasn't even in the box so the seller shipped it broken. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Great color, and the size is just right. Just wish in slots was carved out a little more.
customer_reviews.author: ric

customer_reviews.title: Great looking ash tray
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ash try & love the natural look & feel. If I ever needed another, I'd get one for sure. It keeps the ash in the tray even when windy. it also keeps the smell contained which is most helpful when a friend or family member are bothered by cigar ash smell. I may even get one or more as gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Hammerojustice

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows how I received the product.it is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ciolek

customer_reviews.title: Husband's Gift
customer_reviews.text: He really liked the ashtray. I wanted to get him something different and this was definitely it.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Ashford

customer_reviews.title: mine looks like they dipped it in red paint
customer_reviews.text: not at all as pictured. mine looks like they dipped it in red paint. someone needs to show you how to use a planer...it's pretty "wobbley"
customer_reviews.author: MICMAC

customer_reviews.title: A little bit smaller and deeper than expected but I still love it.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. A little bit smaller and deeper than expected but I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Real wood! Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect much because of the price but I was wrong! It’s made of real varnished wood. The only reason I didn’t give this 5 stars is because there was a small chip on the side of the ashtray.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani Moore

customer_reviews.title: great for indoor/outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: great for indoor/outdoor use. high shine polish. Have gotten many compliments on it. My BF loved it so much I got him one too.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Lakin

customer_reviews.title: Other than that the other two do work and it is a very nice product she was happy with her gift and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my mother for her birthday but one of the places that hold the cigarettes were too small for cigarettes. Other than that the other two do work and it is a very nice product she was happy with her gift and I feel like I got my money's worth. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Seinfeld

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite buys
customer_reviews.text: I love just about everything about this ashtray. You should definitely buy one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Massive crack
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a giant crack through the middle. So large that it completely defeats the purpose of having an ash tray. I might as-well ash directly into my floors.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: It's a spimner!
customer_reviews.text: The bottom is not flat and spins on the table..not sure if it's a faulty product or if that's the norm..would not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: This was well packaged and came in perfect condition. I have never seen an ashtray like this; very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kadie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is actually alot nicer than pic shows. Its bigger than I expected. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: It’s fine
customer_reviews.text: Smells strongly of paint (chemical smell) and the bottom is not completely flat, but good enough for an outdoor ashtray that doesn’t look half bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Ascher

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and performs like the pictures. My only grip is that the enamel they used is much less than the pictures they provided so this ashtray already had cosmetic blemishes that will not wash out.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Gift this!
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a Christmas gift. Sweet and simple and he LOVES it. It matches everything else he has!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Expected a little better!
customer_reviews.text: Feels kind of cheaply made, it came with a couple chipped pieces. It works good for what it is though and the price is reasonable. I just expected something more heavy duty!
customer_reviews.author: samantha meissner

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Oddly enough, I have been looking for an ashtray for a couple of months. This ashtray is obviously functional and looks stately. It is precisely what my back deck needed.
customer_reviews.author: J.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Functional and not ugly for an ashtray!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Functional and not an eye-sore like plain ashtrays.... I like that it is a real piece of wood, bark and all, easy to empty and clean, unsure of how weatherproof it is just yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Cracked when received
customer_reviews.text: The product cane with a crack right through the middle and went up the side. Seemed like it was too cheap to worth buying again. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Q.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ashtray. The weight of it is perfect - not too heavy and not too light. It looks great and it is the perfect size. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Epsikk

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ashtray
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ashtray, it’s pretty but it is just an ashtray. Works great and collects butts and ashes. Good ashtray!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Mayer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: didn't come broken like other reviews kept saying and overall works great
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell. Not coated well
customer_reviews.text: Horrible smell. Not coated well. Will not be using it as an ashtray because burn marks will be left permanently in it.
customer_reviews.author: HHeinze

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful  Ashtrays
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, just right, go great with my house, don't break, high enough, ashes don't spill easy, dont fall off table easily, and they are space saving. Beautiful and useful. I bought one for my husband then I bought two more later, one for me and another in case I lost one or if the prices change. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Developed a large split to the center. Makes a mess
customer_reviews.author: James Page

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Super light and wabbly, would not recommend or purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!  Perfect for my outdoor Patio!
customer_reviews.text: Great item!! The quality is really good and perfect for outdoors on the patio!! Seller was great to work with and would recommend to others!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Storm

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and value
customer_reviews.text: This is a really beautiful and sturdy product at a good price. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Erynne Pryor

customer_reviews.title: still nice.
customer_reviews.text: Could be a bit heavier for patio use; still nice.
customer_reviews.author: SophieGolden

customer_reviews.title: Cracked
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice product, but I’m pretty disappointed because it came with a giant crack in it? Ash trays probably shouldn’t have huge cracks? It kind of defeats the purpose....
customer_reviews.author: McKenleigh Spitler

customer_reviews.title: Looks could be deceiving
customer_reviews.text: I liked it at first at first but then It cracked out of no where and it leaves a mess on my table looking to by another!
customer_reviews.author: pamela delcampo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice touch to our home, and does what it should. Sturdy and good quality overall. I really like.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G.

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: Best gift ever to a smoker. I buy 3 for my friend. Excellent product, real wood and shape. A piece of a tree. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfoandres32

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my friend and he loves it! ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my friend and he loves it! Very cute only problem? The bottom isn't totally flat, which would have been important to know when buying the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Marlowe

customer_reviews.title: Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Looks so much bigger in person! Great quality and looks great, I was really happy I got it! Coaster for size reference
customer_reviews.author: Emma vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Its an Ashtray
customer_reviews.text: Decently sized ashtray, a lot bigger than I though. Looks nice but smells a little weird, pretty sure that'll go away though.
customer_reviews.author: Brenton

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a decor piece!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this ashtray has a clear coat, so it’s easy to clean. It fits well with my dark furniture and I set it on my coffee table and it simply looks like a decor piece.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Chang

customer_reviews.title: Very Realistic
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ashtray, looks like I went out and chopped a piece of a tree to make it, just what I wanted for my rustic office decor
customer_reviews.author: CaliGirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, big, serves its purpose. Got as a gift and recipient loved it
customer_reviews.author: XtraSmall

product_meta.title: Teagas 5.5" Round Original Wooden Cigarette Ashtray Outdoors and Indoors Ash Tray
feature_bullets: Teagas Wooden Ashtray is a practical and fashionable addition to modern decoration
Natural wood grain and bark on top and bottom
Well crafted and equipped with a nice coat of lacquer to ensure sustainability
Groove keeps ashes from blowing out with the wind. Easy to clean and maintain
